message: World’s first solar charger that can be placed inside your note or planner. It is a paper thin and ultra light weight solar charger.

#Busigence is a Decision Intelligence Company. We build #DataProducts using #DataScience, #ArtificialIntelligence  & #DesignThinking concepts. We are looking for #Marketer (#GrowthHacker) who can work on our #promotions & #marketing. #INTERNS are also welcome. #APPLY here (http://bit.ly/2c8ekAz)     or mail your CV to careers@busigence.com.

The submission deadline for the Science of Happiness Challenge has been extended to 18th September!!
This is your chance to take a step towards building a happier society.
Register at  http://www.happiness-iitkgp.org/happiness/registration.php to take part in the competitions and to be a part of the 1st International Workshop in campus on the Science of Happiness on 24th and 25th September!!

Design Credits : Technology Literary Society - TLS, IIT Kharagpur

Aurbataao is a lifestyle gifting website. It has started a campus ambassador program on it's website.
Benefits of program:-
* Certificate of appreciation from the aurbataao.com
* Be the official ambassador of aurbataao.com.
* Also Promote the Young Leaders to participate in aurbataao.com.

http://aurbataao.com/campus-ambassador-program/
